short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that fixes the latest UI improvements done by GitHub team

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Latest changes rolled out by GitHub team contained some quirks that were just hurtful to my eyes. This extension contains few CSS fixes that makes new GH changes more bearable for humans.

What's improved:
- Less rounded buttons, tags and labels
- Fixed terrible green color of primary buttons
- Other buttons now look like buttons, not like tags
